name: feature-generation
description: This script is the second step for Automated Feature Generation. It extends two given train and test datasets with new features that comes from scoring with some unsupervised models created previously

inputs.name: train-dataset
inputs.description: Train dataset to be extended. (e.g. dataset/5d267a147811dd0726000fdd)

inputs.name: test-dataset
inputs.description: Test dataset to be extended (e.g. dataset/5d267a147811dd0726000fdd)

outputs.name: extended-train-dataset
outputs.description: Train dataset extended with the new generated features

outputs.name: extended-test-dataset
outputs.description: Test dataset extended with the new generated features
